vote.title: Authorize a construction services contract for water and wastewater main replacements at 18 locations - SYB Construction Co., Inc., lowest responsible bidder of six - Not to exceed $14,656,533.31 - Financing: 2023C Water Revenue Bonds TWDB LM231535 Fund ($6,926,511.51) and Wastewater Capital Improvement F Fund ($7,730,021.80)
